title: Strengthening Customer Service Practice Competencies: Self-Regulated Learning-Based MOOC Design and Operational Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can independently design a mathematics learning process in a MOOC environment using self-regulated learning strategies.
Learners can monitor cognitive and metacognitive processes using feedback tools (e.g., quizzes, progress indicators).
Learners can build a peer feedback system using asynchronous communication tools and apply it to self-assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
